jobs.title: Part-Time Freelance Graphic Designer Needed
jobs.job_description:
I'm looking for a part-time freelance graphic designer to assist during peak workloads and vacations. The ideal candidate must be:

✅ Proficient in Adobe Suite (especially InDesign)
✅ Experienced in layout design, print, and digital media
✅ Reliable, detail-oriented, and able to meet deadlines
✅ Available on an as-needed basis

The designer will primarily be working on both creating new designs and updating existing ones across print media, digital media, and layout design. Specific print media projects will include brochures and flyers, magazines and newsletters, as well as posters and banners.

Experience in construction or technical design is preferred. Preferred communication method is email. The designer will be expected to work on projects on a sometimes daily basis.

jobs.title: WordPress API Integration & Real-Time Automation
jobs.job_description:
We are looking for an experienced developer to integrate an API from our data supplier into our WordPress site. The data should be updated every few minutes to ensure real-time accuracy.

Requirements:
Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, XML
Strong WordPress development skills (custom plugins, WP Cron Jobs)
Expertise in PHP, JavaScript
Ability to automate data fetching and updating at regular intervals
Experience working with caching mechanisms for performance optimization
Strong debugging & troubleshooting skills
Project Details:
We have an API key and documentation from the supplier
Data needs to be pulled and displayed dynamically on our WordPress site
The update frequency should be every few minutes.

jobs.title: Freelance Mechanical Engineer for AniGears
jobs.job_description:
AniGears, a leading provider of industrial couplings and pulleys, is looking for a freelance Mechanical Engineer to join our team. This part-time role offers flexibility with field visits to client sites to assess and design custom solutions for mechanical systems.

Key Responsibilities:
Conduct on-site inspections of couplings and pulleys in industrial machinery.
Identify and diagnose mechanical issues (e.g., wear, efficiency loss, failure).
Design custom solutions (2D models, sketches) using CAD/ SolidWorks.
Prepare technical reports and collaborate with our manufacturing team.
Advise customers on system improvements and modifications.

jobs.title: Minimalistic Portfolio Showcase Website
jobs.job_description:
I'm looking for a skilled web developer to create a minimalist, clean design freelance website primarily serving as a portfolio showcase for freelancers.

Key Features:
- Skill assessment badges: These will help to validate the skills of freelancers and add an element of gamification to the platform.
- Client testimonials: A section dedicated to reviews from clients. This will enhance credibility and trustworthiness of the freelancers.
- Project galleries: This will allow freelancers to showcase their past work in an organized manner.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in web development with a keen eye for minimalist design. Experience with creating portfolio sites and implementing interactive features like skill badges will be a big plus.

jobs.title: Data Entry for Product Information
jobs.job_description:
I need a data entry operator to help copy and paste product specifications and features from specified websites into an Excel spreadsheet.

You will be provided with a list of 60 products, along with instructions on where to find detailed information about those products. Your task will be to accurately copy the attributes of the products into separate columns for each attribute in the Excel spreadsheet.

Ideal skills and experience:
- Proficiency in Excel
- Attention to detail
- Ability to follow instructions accurately
- Prior experience with data entry is preferred.

jobs.title: Subscription Lunch Service Marketing Specialist
jobs.job_description:
Sales & Marketing Expert for Lunch Box Service
We're looking for a proactive and results-oriented Sales & Marketing Expert to enhance our subscription-based lunch box delivery service, primarily targeting colleges. Your main responsibilities will include:
- Developing marketing strategies to support online initiatives

Your primary focus will be on approaching colleges and making the administration aware of our services. A successful freelancer for this role should possess:
- Strong sales and marketing background
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills
- Experience in offline marketing strategies
- Proficiency in email marketing
- Ability to work part-time and freelance.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer Needed for Session Messenger Deployment
jobs.job_description:
Job Posting: Seeking a Full-Stack Developer for Session Messenger Setup & Deployment (Turnkey Project) ?
Position: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
Project Type: Full Deployment & Configuration (Turnkey Delivery)
Location: Remote
Budget: Negotiable

? Job Overview
We are looking for a highly skilled Full-Stack Developer to set up and deploy Session Messenger on our infrastructure, including server-side components and all client applications (iOS, Android, Desktop).

The ideal candidate should have experience in deploying secure messaging applications, working with Oxen Network, Lokinet, Session nodes, and handling mobile & desktop app builds. If you have a strong background in server administration, secure messaging, and mobile app development, this project is for you!

jobs.title: University Admissions Lead Generation Expert
jobs.job_description:
**Freelance** Lead Generation Specialist (University Admissions)
We are seeking a highly motivated and results-oriented freelance lead generation specialist to drive student inquiries and applications for our university programs. This role focuses on outbound calling and lead qualification to build a robust pipeline of prospective students.
Responsibilities:
1. Conduct outbound calls to potential students, providing information about our university programs and addressing their inquiries.
2. Qualify leads based on pre-defined criteria, identifying students who are a good fit for our programs.
3. Maintain accurate records of all calls and lead information in our CRM system.
4. Schedule appointments for admissions counselors to follow up with qualified leads.
5. Meet or exceed lead generation targets.

Responsibilities: Edit Instagram Reels based on stock market tips, strategies, and trends. Add engaging transitions, stock footage, music, text animations, and effects. Ensure the final output is visually appealing and aligns with the finance and stock market niche. Requirements: Proven experience in editing Instagram Reels or similar short-form content. Familiarity with finance or stock market-related topics is a plus.

Summarize findings and provide insights to support litigation strategy. Collaborate on case strategy and document preparation as needed.

jobs.title: AI Job Application Automation Agent
jobs.job_description:
I want to create an AI agent that automates my job application process. This personal project involves:

- Job scraping from multiple platforms: LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, reed, and monster.
- Resume matching: The AI should be able to match keywords in my resume with the skills required for the job.
- Applying for **jobs**: The AI will send my cover letter and resume to HR.

Additionally, the AI should create a list of **jobs** in Google Sheets.

Ideal candidates for this project should have experience in AI development, specifically in creating job application bots. Familiarity with Google Sheets API is essential. Please include examples of similar projects you've completed in your proposal.
